entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 10:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
